snippet.title: ZX SPECTRUM LONGPLAY - Gregory Loses His Clock 1/3
snippet.description:
Released by Mastertronic 1990 and programmed by Don Priestley of the Popeye and Trapdoor games.  (Although one of my favourites of his was Maziacs)

I bought this little game from Woolworths on its release (budget label - Mastertronic) after reading the Crash review.  It looked good, and I wasn't dissapointed as it held my attention for quite some weeks.  Great to see a programmer from those days that made his own style and continued with that similar colourful cartoon theme with whacky puzzle elements to the gameplay.

I recalled some great memories replaying this. 4/5 stars.
